channel.title: ScanX – IPO News
channel.description: Auto-generated feed for ScanX IPO News

item.title: Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price
item.description: Top News Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price 1 day ago Vidya Wires Limited debuted on BSE at ₹52.13 per share, trading above its IPO issue price of ₹52.00. The listing reflects a modest premium of ₹0.13, representing approximately 0.25% gains over the offer price. The successful market debut enables regular trading of the company's shares on the exchange.

item.title: Kotak Mahindra Bank Limited Schedules Investor Meeting at Citi India Financials Tour 2025
item.description: Kotak Mahindra Bank Limited Schedules Investor Meeting at Citi India Financials Tour 2025 1 hour ago Kotak Mahindra Bank Limited has scheduled an investor meeting for December 16, 2025, at the Citi India Financials Tour 2025 in Mumbai. The bank notified stock exchanges about this engagement with analysts and institutional investors as required under SEBI Regulation 30. The disclosure ensures transparency in investor relations activities and compliance with listing obligations.

item.title: Nifty and Sensex Close in Green: Market Wrap for December 11, 2025
item.description: Nifty and Sensex Close in Green: Market Wrap for December 11, 2025 8 hours ago Indian stock markets ended positively on December 11, with Nifty 50 up 0.55% at 25,898.55 and Sensex rising 0.51% to 84,818.13. Market breadth was bullish with 2,597 advancing stocks out of 4,548 traded. Key buzzing stocks included InterGlobe Aviation, Biocon Biologics, and Kaynes Technology, driven by company-specific news and analyst actions.

item.title: Dynacons Systems & Solutions Secures ₹74.99 Crore Device-as-a-Service Project from Jammu Kashmir Bank
item.description: Dynacons Systems & Solutions Secures ₹74.99 Crore Device-as-a-Service Project from Jammu Kashmir Bank 11 minutes ago Dynacons Systems & Solutions Limited has won a prestigious ₹74.99 crore Device-as-a-Service project from Jammu Kashmir Bank, formally disclosed through regulatory filing under SEBI Regulation 30. The five-year comprehensive digital workplace solution involves deploying 9,851 advanced desktops across 1,019 branches nationwide on an Opex-based model, covering the entire device lifecycle from procurement to e-waste management.
